nodes.text: Stattata was an Imperial Moff who served as Governor of the Lothal sector at the time of Senator Leia Organa's formal request for Imperial compensation regarding a rebel mission on Lothal.

Senator Leia Organa of Alderaan sent a formal grievance to Moff Stattata—the Imperial Governor of the Lothal sector in the aftermath of a theft on Lothal of three Sphyrna-class Hammerhead corvettes owned by the senator, demanding full compensation for her lost ships, which were fully loaded with relief supplies that made up of cargo the Alderaanian also requested Imperial compensation for. In rebel hands, Phoenix Squadron modified the stolen corvettes, and Stattata eventually paid Organa under the latter's threat of bringing the issue to the Senate.
